import React from 'react'; import data from '../data'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' function ServiceScreen (props) { console.log(props.match.params.id); const serviceprovider = data.serviceproviders.find(x => x._id === props.match.params.id); return(

  • {serviceprovider.name}

  • {serviceprovider.rating} Stars
  • Price:{serviceprovider.rate} $
  • Description: {serviceprovider.description}
  • Price: {serviceprovider.rate}$
  • Status: {serviceprovider.status}
  • Hours:
) } export default ServiceScreen;
